aboutPage.description1: CHFTY Pizzas aim to bridge the gap between the Food & Beverage industry and the Metaverse
aboutPage.description2: A collection of 2,777 NFTs that give you access into the largest digital community of foodies and celebrity chefs
aboutPage.description3: The CHFTY brand is creating a new definition for utility. Initial offerings include exclusive digital masterclasses with household name chefs, IRL events, sophisticated kitchenware giveaways and more
aboutPage.description4: And this is just the beginning
aboutPage.description5: Industries are quickly trying to figure out how to get involved in the NFT space. While they are planning, we are building
aboutPage.description6: Led by culinary experts Tom Colicchio and Spike Mendelsohn, CHFTY invites you to grab a virtual slice and connect with a community that is focused on joining holders with their favorite chefs and foods

comingSoon.description1: All CHFTY Pizza hodlers will be elligible to claim a free CHFTY Pass
comingSoon.description2: The CHFTY Pass will introduce an extremely innovative technology that furthers NFT utility IRL

philanthropyPage.description1: CHFTY wants to make an impact in the fight for Food Justice. So we decided to team up with Kimbal Musk’s Big Green DAO and embed their wallet directly into our smart contract
philanthropyPage.description2: As the First Non-Profit led philanthropic DAO, we are excited to help fund their members with a % of our project as they vote on how to help donors

menuPage.description1: The CHFTY Pizza team has a detailed recipe we are following step by step to ensure we grow our brand and community. Here’s some peaks into what we are cooking behind the scenes and what we have planned for the future
